creator: Dan McCreary

subject: User Interface

dublinCore.description: Demonstrates clickable icons in the control region for accessing license information and fullscreen mode. Shows how to add UI elements without cluttering the interface.

learningObjectives: Understand how to add clickable icons to a MicroSim interface
Implement navigation to external pages from within a simulation
Recognize the trade-off between features and code size (40 additional lines)

codeSize.note: Icons can be omitted to reduce file size to 128 lines
